quote: I've failed over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: Success isn’t owned. It’s leased. And rent is due every day.
author: J.J. Watt

quote: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn’t work hard.
author: Tim Notke

quote: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
author: Billie Jean King

quote: The only way to prove you are a good sport is to lose.
author: Ernie Banks

quote: You have to believe in yourself when no one else does.
author: Serena Williams

quote: Pain is temporary. Quitting lasts forever.
author: Lance Armstrong

quote: The more difficult the victory, the greater the happiness in winning.
author: Pelé

quote: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.
author: Babe Ruth

quote: Run when you can, walk if you have to, crawl if you must; just never give up.
author: Dean Karnazes

quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: Don’t count the days; make the days count.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Champions aren't made in gyms. Champions are made from something deep inside.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: If something stands between you and your success, move it. Never be denied.
author: Dwayne Johnson

quote: I never worry about the problem. I worry about the solution.
author: Shaquille O’Neal

quote: You can’t put a limit on anything. The more you dream, the farther you get.
author: Michael Phelps

quote: If you think you're done, you're only 40% done. The human mind limits you.
author: David Goggins

quote: I’ve always believed that if you put in the work, the results will come.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: I hated every minute of training, but I said, ‘Don’t quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.’
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: It’s not whether you get knocked down; it’s whether you get up.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Excellence is not a singular act but a habit. You are what you repeatedly do.
author: Shaquille O’Neal

quote: A trophy carries dust. Memories last forever.
author: Mary Lou Retton

quote: If you are afraid of failure, you don’t deserve to be successful.
author: Charles Barkley

quote: The harder the battle, the sweeter the victory.
author: Les Brown

quote: You win some, you lose some, but you live to fight another day.
author: Ice Cube

quote: The world’s most successful people have the same 24 hours you do. Use them wisely.
author: Kobe Bryant

quote: Greatness is not guarding yourself from the people. It's being accepted by the people.
author: LeBron James

quote: Everything negative—pressure, challenges—is an opportunity for me to rise.
author: Kobe Bryant

quote: I'm not the next Usain Bolt. I'm the first me.
author: Andre De Grasse

quote: You have to expect things of yourself before you can do them.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: I've failed many times, but that is why I succeed.
author: Larry Bird

quote: Pressure is something you feel when you don’t know what you’re doing.
author: Chuck Noll

quote: The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
author: Sean Patrick Flanery

quote: Obsessed is just a word the lazy use to describe the dedicated.
author: Russell Warren

quote: When you have a dream, you’ve got to grab it and never let go.
author: Carol Burnett

quote: You cannot achieve greatness without hard work.
author: Lionel Messi

quote: I don’t count my sit-ups. I only start counting when it starts hurting.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Believe you can, and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Winning isn’t everything, but wanting to win is.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: The more you sweat in practice, the less you bleed in battle.
author: Richard Marcinko

quote: Discipline is choosing what you want most over what you want now.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: If you can't outplay them, outwork them.
author: Ben Hogan

quote: Not all storms come to disrupt your life. Some come to clear your path.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Make each day your masterpiece.
author: John Wooden

quote: A champion is someone who gets up when they can’t.
author: Jack Dempsey

quote: What hurts today makes you stronger tomorrow.
author: Jay Cutler

quote: Courage is not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Champions believe in themselves even when no one else does.
author: Unknown

quote: Winning takes precedence. If you’re not willing to give everything, don’t even show up.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: The last three or four reps is what makes the muscle grow.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: You can’t win unless you learn how to lose.
author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quote: Rise and grind. It’s not a slogan — it's a lifestyle.
author: Kobe Bryant

quote: Stay hungry. Stay foolish.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: The difference between the impossible and the possible lies in determination.
author: Usain Bolt

quote: When you’re good at something, you’ll tell everyone. When you’re great, they’ll tell you.
author: Walter Payton

quote: It’s harder to stay on top than it is to make the climb.
author: Pat Summitt

quote: A calm mind brings inner strength and self-confidence.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: You can’t get much done in life if you only work on the days you feel good.
author: Jerry West

quote: If you fail to prepare, you're prepared to fail.
author: Mark Spitz

quote: Champions train. Losers complain.
author: Unknown

quote: Success is not final; failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Never say never, because limits like fears are often just an illusion.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: Some people want it to happen. Some wish it would happen. Others make it happen.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Don’t practice until you get it right. Practice until you can’t get it wrong.
author: Unknown

quote: You don’t need to be perfect; just be better than yesterday.
author: Conor McGregor

quote: Every champion was once a contender who refused to give up.
author: Rocky Balboa

quote: You must expect great things of yourself before you can do them.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: If it doesn’t challenge you, it won’t change you.
author: Fred DeVito

quote: There may be people with more talent, but there’s no excuse for anyone to work harder than you do.
author: Derek Jeter

quote: I've learned that something constructive comes from every defeat.
author: Tom Landry

quote: If you want to be the best, you have to do things that other people aren’t willing to do.
author: Michael Phelps

quote: Your life is your story. Write well. Edit often.
author: Susan Statham

quote: A hero is someone who has given his life to something bigger than himself.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
author: John Wooden

quote: It’s not the will to win that matters. It’s the will to prepare.
author: Paul Bryant

quote: Fear kills more dreams than failure ever will.
author: Suzy Kassem

quote: Mental toughness is doing what you don’t want to do, when you don’t want to do it.
author: Bobby Knight

quote: Success is a journey, not a destination.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: You cannot swim for new horizons until you have courage to lose sight of the shore.
author: William Faulkner

quote: A goal is just a dream with a deadline.
author: Joe Montana

quote: Courage is doing what you're afraid to do. There can be no courage unless you're scared.
author: Eddie Rickenbacker

quote: Don’t let winning make you soft. Don’t let losing make you quit.
author: Unknown

quote: Effort is fully replenishable. You can always give more.
author: J.J. Watt

quote: The harder you work, the harder it is to surrender.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Work hard in silence. Let your success make the noise.
author: Frank Ocean

quote: The moment you give up is the moment you let someone else win.
author: Kobe Bryant

quote: Practice like you've never won. Perform like you've never lost.
author: Bernard F. Asuncion

quote: Most people give up right before the big break comes. Don’t be most people.
author: Unknown

quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: The fight is won or lost far away from witnesses.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Great things never came from comfort zones.
author: Neil Strauss

quote: Dedication makes dreams come true.
author: Kobe Bryant

quote: A setback is a setup for a comeback.
author: T.D. Jakes

quote: If they don’t understand your passion, they’re not meant to.
author: Kevin Durant

quote: Legendary is not about the wins. It's about the consistency.
author: Cristiano Ronaldo

quote: Be stronger than your excuses.
author: Unknown
